summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Media page milestones reversion and Career page design language updates. All requirements successfully implemented and working correctly.
passed_tests: Media page milestones reverted to original animated timeline path
Media page shows green year text, pulsing dots, and gradient line animation
Career page hero matches About/Industries style with green line + label pattern
Career page has stats grid on right side of hero (4 stat cards)
Career page Culture section has 4 pillars in cards with green icons
Career page Application Process is timeline style with animated path (5 steps)
Career page Job Openings show cards with department tags, location, salary
Career page has consistent light green (#F7FFF5) backgrounds alternating with white
Career page CTA section has green (#4E9141) background
All navigation links work correctly on Career page
Services dropdown works with 4 service items
Header glassmorphism effect activates on scroll (backdrop-blur: blur(24px))
Mobile menu toggle correctly hidden on desktop
Contact CTA button present and functional
